title: GOLGO 13 Show,Film,Assignment Kowloon,The Professional,Queen Bee
description:
Hey guys, this torrent contains the COMPLETE -Collection- of an anime series called "GOLGO 13" (from 1973 to 2009)! This is all that it contains:

a. LIVE-Action Movies (both JAPANESE Audio - 480p): Golgo 13 (1973) and Assignment Kowloon (1977) Films.

b. Animated Movie and OVA (both DUAL Audio): The Professional (1983 Movie - 720p) and Queen Bee (OVA Film - 480p).

c. ANIME Series (720p - DUAL Audio): Golgo 13 (2008-2009).

d. OST (Original Sound Track) MUSIC - Golgo 13: The Professional (MP3s).

Plot Synopsis:

Golgo 13 (1973 Film) - "An assassin (Ken Takakura) seeks justice against an international criminal".

Golgo 13: Assignment Kowloon (1977) - "Blood for Money! Sonny Chiba is "Golgo 13", a cold, calculating, ruthless assassin, working for the U.S. drug syndicate. His assignment: "take-out" Hong Kong's underworld kingpin. His only obstacle: a relentless cop, determined to stop him - no matter what the cost. The result is an explosive adventure through the seamy, violent streets of Hong Kong. Golgo 13: Assignment Kowloon is a 1977 action movie starring Sonny Chiba as the international assassin Golgo 13. It was the second live-action movie based on the Golgo 13 manga".

Golgo 13: The Professional (1983) - "A man hires superhumans to eliminate brutal Golgo, the paid assassin who killed his son".

Golgo 13: Queen Bee (1998) - "Golgo 13 is hired to assassinate Queen Bee, the second-in-command of a South American rebel army, to prevent her from killing the United States democratic presidential nominee".

Golgo 13: ANIME Series (2008-09) - "An internationally known killer-for-hire accepts jobs around the globe".
